thread.title: Donnie
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Donnie

author: Donnie
title: Donnie
text: Our experience was excellent. Sally was very knowledgable about each item we looked at. She was there anytime we had a question and made sure we had all the information about the furniture, financing and delivery we needed to make our decision. We would definitely recommend Home Zone Furniture.
